en: Narrator: Peppa is waiting for her best friend, Suzy Sheep.
cn: 旁白：佩奇正在等她最好的朋友苏茜羊。

sentence.en: Peppa is waiting for her best friend, Suzy Sheep.
sentence.cn: 佩奇正在等她最好的朋友苏茜羊。

examples.en: Peppa is waiting for her brother, George.
examples.cn: 佩奇正在等她的弟弟乔治。

examples.en: Peppa is waiting for her mummy, Mummy Pig.
examples.cn: 佩奇正在等她的妈妈，猪妈妈。

en: Peppa Pig: Hello, Suzy.
cn: 佩奇：你好，苏茜。

en: Suzy: Hello, Peppa.
cn: 苏茜：你好，佩奇。

en: Narrator: Suzy Sheep has come to play with Peppa.
cn: 旁白：苏茜羊来和佩奇玩了。

en: Narrator: Peppa loves Suzy.
cn: 旁白：佩奇很喜欢苏茜。

en: Narrator: Suzy loves Peppa.
cn: 旁白：苏茜很喜欢佩奇。

en: Narrator: They are best friends.
cn: 旁白：她们是最好的朋友。

en: Mummy Pig: Peppa, why don’t you and Suzy play in your bedroom?
cn: 猪妈妈：佩奇，你和苏茜为什么不去你房间玩呢？

sentence.en: Why don’t you and Suzy play in your bedroom?
sentence.cn: 你和苏茜为什么不去你房间玩呢？

examples.en: Why don’t you and George play outside?
examples.cn: 你和乔治为什么不去外面玩？

examples.en: Why don’t you and Daddy Pig watch TV?
examples.cn: 你和猪爸爸为什么不去看电视？

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, Mummy.
cn: 佩奇：好的，妈妈。

en: Narrator: George wants to play, too.
cn: 旁白：乔治也想一起玩。

en: Narrator: Peppa and Suzy love playing in Peppa’s bedroom.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和苏茜喜欢在佩奇的房间里玩。

en: Narrator: So does George.
cn: 旁白：乔治也喜欢。

en: Peppa Pig: No, George. This game is just for big girls.
cn: 佩奇：不行，乔治，这个游戏只有大女孩才能玩。

sentence.en: This game is just for big girls.
sentence.cn: 这个游戏只有大女孩才能玩。

examples.en: This food is just for grown-ups.
This shop is just for children.
examples.cn: 这家店只有小孩才能进。

en: Peppa Pig: Go and play with your own toys.
cn: 佩奇：去玩你自己的玩具吧。

en: Narrator: Peppa and Suzy want to play on their own.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和苏茜想自己玩。

en: Peppa Pig: I’m a tiny little fairy princess.
cn: 佩奇：我是一个小小的仙女公主。

en: Peppa Pig: I’m going to wave my magic wand and turn you into a frog.
cn: 佩奇：我要挥动我的魔法棒把你变成青蛙。

en: Narrator: George doesn’t like playing on his own.
cn: 旁白：乔治不喜欢自己玩。

en: Narrator: George wants to play, too.
cn: 旁白：乔治也想一起玩。

en: Peppa Pig: No, George. I’m playing with Suzy.
cn: 佩奇：不行，乔治，我在和苏茜玩。

en: Peppa Pig: You have to play somewhere else.
cn: 佩奇：你得去别的地方玩。

sentence.en: You have to play somewhere else.

examples.en: You have to eat your vegetables.
You have to go to bed early.

en: Narrator: George wants to play with Peppa. He feels a bit lonely.
cn: 旁白：乔治想和佩奇玩，他有点孤单。

examples.en: She feels a bit sad.
He feels a bit tired.

en: Mummy Pig: George, I need some help. I’m making chocolate chip cookies.
cn: 猪妈妈：乔治，我需要帮忙。我在做巧克力曲奇。

en: Mummy Pig: Someone needs to lick out the bowl.
cn: 猪妈妈：需要有人把碗舔干净。

en: Narrator: George likes helping Mummy make cookies, but he likes playing with Peppa more.
cn: 旁白：乔治喜欢帮妈妈做饼干，但他更喜欢和佩奇玩。

sentence.en: He likes playing with Peppa more.

examples.en: She likes playing with her friends more.
examples.cn: 她更喜欢和她的朋友们玩。

examples.en: He likes eating ice cream more.

en: Suzy: I want to be a nurse.
cn: 苏茜：我想当护士。

en: Peppa Pig: I want to be a doctor.
cn: 佩奇：我想当医生。

en: Suzy: But who’s going to be the sick person?
cn: 苏茜：那谁来当病人呢？

sentence.en: Who’s going to be the sick person?

examples.en: Who’s going to be the teacher?
Who’s going to be the driver?

en: Peppa Pig: George!
cn: 佩奇：乔治！

en: Narrator: Peppa and Suzy love playing doctors and nurses.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和苏茜喜欢玩医生和护士的游戏。

en: Narrator: So does George.
cn: 旁白：乔治也喜欢。

en: Narrator: Peppa listens to George’s chest.
cn: 旁白：佩奇在听乔治的胸口。

en: Peppa Pig: Now, George. Take a big breath in, then cough.
cn: 佩奇：现在，乔治，深呼吸，然后咳嗽。

en: Peppa Pig: I think your heart’s a bit loose.
cn: 佩奇：我觉得你的心有点松。

en: Peppa Pig: I’ll put a plaster on it.
cn: 佩奇：我给你贴个创可贴。

en: Suzy: Open wide, please.
cn: 苏茜：请张大嘴。

en: Narrator: Suzy takes George’s temperature.
cn: 旁白：苏茜在给乔治量体温。

en: Suzy: Oh, dear. You’re very very hot.
cn: 苏茜：哎呀，你发烧得很厉害。

en: Suzy: I think you have to stay in bed for three years.
cn: 苏茜：我觉得你得在床上躺三年。

sentence.en: You have to stay in bed for three years.

examples.en: You have to stay in bed for one week.
You have to stay in bed for two days.

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig has come to find George.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸来找乔治了。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh, no. What’s wrong with George?
cn: 猪爸爸：哦，不。乔治怎么了？

en: Peppa Pig: Don’t worry, Daddy. It’s only a game.
cn: 佩奇：别担心，爸爸，这只是个游戏。

en: Peppa Pig: George is our patient.
cn: 佩奇：乔治是我们的病人。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh, I see.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦，我明白了。

en: Daddy Pig: Can the patient have a visitor?
cn: 猪爸爸：病人可以有访客吗？

en: Peppa Pig: Just for a little while.
cn: 佩奇：只能待一小会儿。

en: Peppa Pig: He might get tired.
cn: 佩奇：他可能会累。

examples.en: She might get hungry.
They might get bored.

en: Peppa and Suzy: Cookies!
cn: 佩奇和苏茜：饼干！

en: Mummy Pig: Yes, they’re for George. They’re his medicine to make him feel better.
cn: 猪妈妈：是的，这些是给乔治的，是让他好起来的药。

points.en: his medicine to make him feel better

en: Daddy Pig: Um, excuse me, doctor. Can you help me? I have a sore tummy.
cn: 猪爸爸：呃，医生，请帮帮我，我肚子疼。

en: Daddy Pig: That tickled.
cn: 猪爸爸：好痒啊。

en: Peppa Pig: I can hear it rumbling.
cn: 佩奇：我能听到肚子咕咕叫。

examples.en: I can hear it growling.
I can hear it buzzing.

en: Peppa Pig: I think you’re hungry, Daddy.
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，我觉得你饿了。

en: Daddy Pig: Well, I think I need lots of cookies to make me better.
cn: 猪爸爸：嗯，我觉得我需要很多饼干才能好起来。

sentence.en: I need lots of cookies to make me better.
sentence.cn: 我需要很多饼干才能好起来。

examples.en: I need lots of rest to make me better.
examples.cn: 我需要多休息才能好起来。

examples.en: I need lots of water to make me better.
examples.cn: 我需要多喝水才能好起来。

en: Mummy Pig: And me.
cn: 猪妈妈：我也要。

en: Peppa Pig: And me.
cn: 佩奇：我也要。

en: Suzy: And me.
cn: 苏茜：我也要。
